name: Amygdala
description:
“His body stolen by an angry wizard, an ordinary man must venture into a surreal and magical world. Facing off against a menagerie of foes and a grueling array of obstacles with his surprising mobility and new-found psychic powers he discovers something important about himself and about goddamned wizards.”

Amygdala by MachineSpirit is an action platformer for Desktop and Android with an insane menagerie of foes, dastardly traps and dynamically generated levels to infuriate you forever!
